statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); COLOR_CWD='\033[0;34m'; COLOR_GIT='\033[0;36m'; COLOR_SUCCESS='\033[0;32m'; RESET='\033[m'; SYMBOL_BRANCH=''; SYMBOL_MOD='*'; SYMBOL_PUSH='↑'; SYMBOL_PULL='↓'; PS_SYMBOL=''; get_git_info() { git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1 || return; ref=$(git -C "$cwd" symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); [[ -n "$ref" ]] && ref="$SYMBOL_BRANCH$ref" || ref=$(git -C "$cwd" describe --tags --always 2>/dev/null); [[ -n "$ref" ]] || return; marks=""; while IFS= read -r line; do if [[ $line =~ ^## ]]; then [[ $line =~ ahead\ ([0-9]+) ]] && marks+=" $SYMBOL_PUSH${BASH_REMATCH[1]}"; [[ $line =~ behind\ ([0-9]+) ]] && marks+=" $SYMBOL_PULL${BASH_REMATCH[1]}"; else marks="$SYMBOL_MOD$marks"; break; fi; done < <(git -C "$cwd" status --porcelain --branch 2>/dev/null); printf " %s%s" "$ref" "$marks"; }; if command -v path-shrinker >/dev/null 2>&1; then short_path=$(echo "$cwd" | path-shrinker -fish); else short_path="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; fi; git_info=$(get_git_info); printf "${COLOR_CWD}%s${RESET}${COLOR_GIT}%s${RESET} ${COLOR_SUCCESS}%s${RESET}" "$short_path" "$git_info" "$PS_SYMBOL"
